about_the_game:
What if the person you are with wants more than you? Would you feel pressured to comply? Maybe winding up stranded on an island is just what you need to figure things out. But what if that island was filled with three other beautiful women? Love isn't always easy. Would you stay loyal to the one you loved back home or would you forge a new relationship? On Getaway Island, time is your ally, so relax and enjoy your stay. The decision is up to you!


Getaway Island features the following:
  • A complete story with two unique endings
  • Three beautiful women to meet and romance
  • A tailored date for each woman
  • Multiple choices peppered throughout the game
  • 15 unique CG scenes to unlock
  • 3 Hidden bonus CG scenes to uncover
  • Steam Trading Card support
  • Steam Cloud support
detailed_description:
Update Notes

We are pleased to release an updated build of Getaway Island with a few free touches! This release includes graphical updates, spelling corrections, and a handy rollback feature which lets you rewind your choices to explore other options (accessed by scrolling the mouse wheel upwards). This content is free for all existing and new purchasers of Getaway Island! We appreciate your support!

short_description: Getaway Island is a visual novel where your decisions determine your outcome. Perhaps you'll find the love of your life, or maybe you will return home a loyal man. This decision is yours to make. Maybe being stranded isn't so bad. We hope you enjoy your stay on Getaway Island!
